LanguageData.GR_EldritchBear.label: bear young
LanguageData.GR_EldritchBear.description: This otherworldly bear has repulsive, purple coloured tentacles protruding from its maw. Its pelt has a strange wooden-like appearance. Its ravenous appetite can only be sated by consuming large amounts of meat, which the creature dissolves with the green acidic goo dropping from its many gaping maws.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All bear hybrids have stun attacks. Since the creature constantly regenerates, its tentacles can be trimmed every few days, and used as a substitute for wood.
LanguageData.GR_EldritchBear.tools.0.label: hooves
LanguageData.GR_EldritchBear.tools.1.label: tentacles
LanguageData.GR_EldritchBear.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GR_EldritchBoomalope.label: formless boomalope of Tsathoggua
LanguageData.GR_EldritchBoomalope.description: This polymorphic entity is made of light brown ichor and looks like amorphous goo. It seems to be extremely resilient and very difficult to dispatch. Its pelt seems to be powerfully acidic in substance and can dissolve human flesh with even a slight touch.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Explodes on death with a very powerful psionic blast. This explosion can also be triggered on command, though it will damage the creature too!
LanguageData.GR_EldritchBoomalope.tools.0.label: amoebic tentacle
LanguageData.GR_EldritchBoomalope.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.GR_EldritchChicken.label: chicken of Mi-go
LanguageData.GR_EldritchChicken.description: An unholy amalgamation of fungus, crustacean, insect and... chicken. Can this creature even be considered to be truly alive?\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> This psionic chicken lays A LOT of purple eggs that erode your sanity. What's not to love?
LanguageData.GR_EldritchChicken.tools.0.label: overwhelming mind
LanguageData.GR_EldritchChicken.tools.1.label: body
LanguageData.GR_EldritchInsectoid.label: armoured chthonian larva
LanguageData.GR_EldritchInsectoid.description: This engorged, tick-like creature has a writhing mass of tentacles where its head would normally be, sensing their surroundings by a combination of touch and echolocation. They have lost their capacity to burrow underground, but they are capable of powerful psionic attacks.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All insectoid hybrids have good armor and no toxic sensitivity, but they are always sterile and can't reproduce, even if a fertility booster is used to create them. Produces eldritch insect jelly, a very nutritive and enjoyable food that quickly erodes your sanity.
LanguageData.GR_EldritchInsectoid.tools.0.label: grasping tentacles
LanguageData.GR_EldritchInsectoid.tools.1.label: overwhelming mind
LanguageData.GR_EldritchInsectoid.tools.2.label: mandibles
LanguageData.GR_EldritchMuffalo.label: star vampire muffalo
LanguageData.GR_EldritchMuffalo.description: This blind muffalo can detect its prey by scent, and is attracted to animal -and human- blood, although it can also consume vegetal matter.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Decent pack beast that doesn't need to be penned. Produces milk and wool. Purple milk and wool...
LanguageData.GR_EldritchMuffalo.tools.0.label: vampiric teeth
LanguageData.GR_EldritchReptile.label: snake of Yig
LanguageData.GR_EldritchReptile.description: This multi-headed snake has been blessed by Yig, the Father of Serpents. Or maybe it is just a very unfortunate snake which has been the target of your colonists' mad science... It is most likely the latter, to be honest.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All reptile hybrids have good temperature tolerance ranges and venomous attacks. The snake of Yig has six mouths, and attacks incredibly fast.
LanguageData.GR_EldritchReptile.tools.0.label: toxic bite
LanguageData.GR_EldritchThrumbo.label: cthrumbo
LanguageData.GR_EldritchThrumbo.description: Iä! Iä! Cthrumbo fhtagn! Ph'nglui mglw'nfah Cthrumbo Rimworld wgah'nagl fhtagn! A gigantic, squid-like creature that feeds on fear and nightmares. Legends say that an Eldritch Cthrumbo is really the wisest creature in the universe - it simply would melt the minds of everyone near it should it choose to speak.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All colossal hybrids have very slow attacks, but hit very hard, and possess natural armor. Invoke insanity ability: twice a day, the Cthrumbo can release a cloud of insanity that erodes its prey's mind.
LanguageData.GR_EldritchThrumbo.tools.0.label: rending claws
LanguageData.GR_EldritchThrumbo.tools.1.label: mandibles
LanguageData.GR_EldritchWolf.label: wolf-Sothoth
LanguageData.GR_EldritchWolf.description: The back of this feral looking wolf is an indistinct mass of tentacles and malign eyes, constantly shifting in place and being reabsorbed into its pelt again.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All canine hybrids get the Adrenaline rush ability, which allows them to move at 200% speed for a short time, but be tired and move slower for half a day afterwards. This creature doesn't have a huge health pool, but it is nearly impervious to damage.
LanguageData.GR_EldritchWolf.tools.0.label: venomous fangs
